transitions = {
    ('A', 'go'): (1.0, 'B'),
    ('B', 'go'): (2.0, 'C'),
    ('C', 'go'): (3.0, 'terminal')
}
initial_states = ['A']
alpha = 0.5
gamma = 0.9
max_steps = 5
Q = sarsa_update(transitions, initial_states, alpha, gamma, max_steps)
for k in sorted(Q):
    print(f"Q{str(k):15} = {Q[k]:.4f}")

transitions = {
    ('S1', 'left'): (2.0, 'S2'),
    ('S1', 'right'): (1.0, 'S3'),
    ('S2', 'left'): (0.5, 'terminal'),
    ('S3', 'right'): (0.5, 'terminal')
}
initial_states = ['S1', 'S2', 'S3']
alpha = 0.1
gamma = 0.8
max_steps = 10
Q = sarsa_update(transitions, initial_states, alpha, gamma, max_steps)
for k in sorted(Q):
    print(f"Q{str(k):15} = {Q[k]:.4f}")

transitions = {
    ('A', 'x'): (0.0, 'terminal'),
    ('A', 'y'): (5.0, 'B'),
    ('B', 'z'): (2.0, 'terminal')
}
initial_states = ['A']
alpha = 0.4
gamma = 0.9
max_steps = 3
Q = sarsa_update(transitions, initial_states, alpha, gamma, max_steps)
for k in sorted(Q):
    print(f"Q{str(k):15} = {Q[k]:.4f}")
